thread.title: You look familiar! Take Me Out contestant who found a wife on the show auditions for The Voice tonight
thread.title_full: You look familiar! Take Me Out contestant who found a wife on the show auditions for The Voice tonight

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: You look familiar! Take Me Out contestant who found a wife on the show auditions for The Voice tonight
text:
TV You look familiar! Take Me Out contestant who found a wife on the show auditions for The Voice tonight Singer Gavin Ellis found love on the ITV dating series but is now looking for a break with his singing career Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in Take Me Out contestant who found a wife on the show is on The Voice tonight Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
A former Take Me Out contestant who got married to his date on the show has swapped love for music on his TV CV. 
Musician Gavin Ellis, 30, fell in love with contestant Gemma Gordon on Take Me Out in 2013, and is now back on our screens on tonight's episode of ITV talent show The Voice. 
Stay at home dad Gavin dreams of having a successful music career, but needs to land his big break before it’s too late. Gavin Ellis first appeared on screens on Take Me Out, and now he's on The Voice (Photo: ITV) Gavin sings a cover of Eric Clapton's Tears In Heaven (Photo: ITV) Gemma backstage with Emma Willis (Photo: ITV) 
He performs a cover of Eric Clapton’s Tears In Heaven to four emotional-looking judges. And Gemma’s there too backstage, getting a cuddle from Emma Willis. 
Gavin and Gemma were the first ever couple to marry from Take Me Out, and had a baby and got married two years later. 
“I can’t believe how it all turned out,” Gavin told the Mirror in 2015. “If someone said two years ago that I’d meet the love of my life, be marrying them and expecting a baby, I would’ve told them to go away. Gavin dressed as Slash from Guns 'N' Roses and Gemma on Take Me Out (Photo: ITV) Gavin and Gemma on the Isle of Fernandos (Photo: ITV) Read More The Voice judges have broken the show's new rules one week from the end of blind auditions 
“I just thought it would be a laugh. Falling in love with Gemma is so exciting but it took me by surprise. I’m just really glad I went on the show.” 
In the talent stage of the show, Gavin impressed Gemma with his rendition of Guns ’N’ Roses song Paradise City, dressed as guitarist Slash. 
“Anyone prepared to go on national TV in a wig, leather pants and giant crocodile shoes can’t take himself too seriously,” explained Gemma back at the time. “I thought we’d probably get on.” 
The Voice , Saturday on ITV at 8pm Like us on Facebook
